zh: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。
en: Learning without thought is labour lost; thought without learning is perilous.

zh: 三人行，必有我师焉。
en: Among any three people walking, I will find something to learn for sure.

zh: 知之为知之，不知为不知，是知也。
en: To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.

zh: 工欲善其事，必先利其器。
en: A craftsman who wishes to do his work well must first sharpen his tools.

zh: 数据是新的石油。
en: Data is the new oil.

zh: 在你不能衡量它之前，你无法改进它。
en: If you can't measure it, you can't improve it.

zh: 简洁是智慧的灵魂，冗长是肤浅的藻饰。
en: Brevity is the soul of wit.

zh: 我之所以看得更远，是因为站在巨人的肩膀上。
en: If I have seen further, it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

zh: 千里之行，始于足下。
en: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

zh: 知之者不如好之者，好之者不如乐之者。
en: One who knows is not equal to one who loves; one who loves is not equal to one who delights in it.

zh: Stay hungry, stay foolish.（求知若饥，虚心若愚）
en: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

zh: 预测未来的最好方法就是创造它。
en: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

zh: 音乐是比一切智慧、一切哲学更高的启示。
en: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.

zh: 天行健，君子以自强不息。
en: Heaven moves on; the superior man never ceases to strengthen himself.

zh: 上善若水，水善利万物而不争。
en: The highest good is like water, which benefits all things without contention.

zh: 不积跬步，无以至千里。
en: Without accumulating small steps, one cannot reach a thousand miles.

zh: 博学之，审问之，慎思之，明辨之，笃行之。
en: Study extensively, inquire accurately, reflect carefully, discriminate clearly, practice earnestly.

zh: 己所不欲，勿施于人。
en: Do not do unto others what you would not have them do unto you.

zh: 路漫漫其修远兮，吾将上下而求索。
en: The road ahead is long and arduous; I shall search high and low.

zh: 纸上得来终觉浅，绝知此事要躬行。
en: What you learn from books is shallow; true knowledge comes from practice.

zh: 世上无难事，只怕有心人。
en: Nothing is impossible to a willing mind.

zh: 失败是成功之母。
en: Failure is the mother of success.

zh: 温故而知新，可以为师矣。
en: By reviewing the old, one learns the new; such a person can be a teacher.

zh: 业精于勤，荒于嬉。
en: Excellence comes from diligence; neglect leads to ruin.

zh: 海纳百川，有容乃大。
en: The sea embraces all rivers because of its vastness.

zh: 生活不止眼前的苟且，还有诗和远方。
en: Life is not just about the immediate struggles, but also poetry and distant horizons.

zh: 天下兴亡，匹夫有责。
en: Every person shares responsibility for the fate of the nation.

zh: 读万卷书，行万里路。
en: Read ten thousand books, travel ten thousand miles.

zh: 知行合一。
en: Knowledge and action are one.

zh: 生于忧患，死于安乐。
en: We survive through adversity and perish in comfort.

zh: 我思故我在。
en: I think, therefore I am.

zh: 知识就是力量。
en: Knowledge is power.

zh: 生存还是毁灭，这是一个问题。
en: To be, or not to be, that is the question.

zh: 天才是百分之一的灵感加百分之九十九的汗水。
en: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

zh: 给我一个支点，我就能撬动地球。
en: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.

zh: 想象力比知识更重要。
en: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

zh: 疯狂就是重复做同样的事情，却期待不同的结果。
en: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.

zh: 人生苦短，我用Python。
en: Life is short, I use Python.

zh: 简单是终极的复杂。
en: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

zh: 优秀的设计是显而易见的，伟大的设计是透明的。
en: Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent.

zh: 少即是多。
en: Less is more.

zh: 代码写给人看的，只是偶尔让机器执行。
en: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.

zh: 过早优化是万恶之源。
en: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.

zh: 软件工程的目标是控制复杂性，而不是增加它。
en: The goal of software engineering is to control complexity, not to create it.

zh: 先让它工作，再让它正确，最后让它快。
en: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.

zh: 任何可能出错的事情，最终都会出错。
en: Anything that can go wrong will go wrong.

zh: 没有银弹。
en: There is no silver bullet.

zh: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
en: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

zh: 好的程序员用脑袋写代码，伟大的程序员用心写代码。
en: Good programmers write code with their heads; great programmers write code with their hearts.

zh: 生活就像骑自行车，要保持平衡就得不断前进。
en: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

zh: 成功不是最终的，失败也不是致命的，重要的是继续前进的勇气。
en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

zh: 真正的智慧是知道自己一无所知。
en: True wisdom is knowing that you know nothing.

zh: 教育不是灌输，而是点燃火焰。
en: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.

zh: 一个人的价值不在于他获得了什么，而在于他贡献了什么。
en: The value of a man lies not in what he obtains, but in what he contributes.

zh: 机会总是留给有准备的人。
en: Chance favors the prepared mind.

zh: 我没有失败，我只是找到了一万种行不通的方法。
en: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

zh: 逻辑会把你从A带到B，想象力能带你去任何地方。
en: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.

zh: 不要问你的国家能为你做什么，要问你能为国家做什么。
en: Ask not what your country can do for you — ask what you can do for your country.

zh: 我有一个梦想。
en: I have a dream.

zh: 世界上只有一种英雄主义：看清生活的真相之后，依然热爱生活。
en: There is only one heroism in the world: to see the world as it is, and to love it.

zh: 人不是生来就会被打败的。
en: A man is not made for defeat.

zh: 勇气不是不恐惧，而是判断有比恐惧更重要的事情。
en: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the judgment that something else is more important than fear.

zh: 如果你想走得快，就一个人走；如果你想走得远，就一起走。
en: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.

zh: 伟大的事情不是一蹴而就的，而是由一系列小事汇集而成。
en: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.

zh: 每一个不曾起舞的日子，都是对生命的辜负。
en: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.

zh: 人是会思考的芦苇。
en: Man is but a reed, the weakest thing in nature; but he is a thinking reed.

zh: 自由不是做你想做的事，而是做你应该做的事。
en: Liberty is not doing what you want, but wanting what you ought.

zh: 历史不会重演，但会押韵。
en: History doesn't repeat itself, but it often rhymes.

zh: 二十年后，你会更后悔那些没做的事，而不是做过的事。
en: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did.

zh: 凡是过往，皆为序章。
en: What's past is prologue.

zh: 没有人是一座孤岛。
en: No man is an island.

zh: 活着就是为了改变世界，难道还有其他原因吗？
en: We're here to put a dent in the universe. Otherwise, why else even be here?

zh: 你的时间有限，不要浪费在过别人的生活上。
en: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.

zh: 创新区分领导者和追随者。
en: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

zh: 设计不仅是外观和感觉，设计是它如何工作。
en: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

zh: 最危险的事情就是维持现状。
en: The only thing more dangerous than holding on is letting go.

zh: 不要因为走得太远，而忘记了为什么出发。
en: Do not forget your reason for the journey, no matter how far you've traveled.

zh: 在最深的绝望里，遇见最美的惊喜。
en: In the deepest despair, discover the most beautiful surprise.

zh: 人生就像一盒巧克力，你永远不知道下一颗是什么味道。
en: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

zh: 要么忙着生，要么忙着死。
en: Get busy living, or get busy dying.

zh: 希望是好事，也许是人间至善，而美好的事物永不消逝。
en: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.

zh: 愿原力与你同在。
en: May the Force be with you.

zh: 能力越大，责任越大。
en: With great power comes great responsibility.

zh: 昨天是历史，明天是谜团，只有今天是礼物。
en: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift.

zh: 做你自己，因为别人都有人做了。
en: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

zh: 我们都在阴沟里，但仍有人仰望星空。
en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.

zh: 教育的目的是用能接受新思想的头脑取代空空如也的头脑。
en: The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.

zh: 唯一真正的智慧是知道自己一无所知。
en: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

zh: 未经审视的人生不值得过。
en: The unexamined life is not worth living.

zh: 吾爱吾师，吾更爱真理。
en: Plato is dear to me, but dearer still is truth.

zh: 人是万物的尺度。
en: Man is the measure of all things.

zh: 我唯一知道的就是我一无所知。
en: I know that I know nothing.

zh: 时间是最好的老师，但不幸的是它杀死了所有学生。
en: Time is the best teacher, but unfortunately, it kills all its students.

zh: 幽默是人类面对困境时最高贵的自我解嘲。
en: Humor is mankind's greatest blessing.

zh: 成功的秘诀在于永不改变你的目标。
en: The secret of success is constancy to purpose.

zh: 价格是你付出的，价值是你得到的。
en: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.

zh: 在别人贪婪时恐惧，在别人恐惧时贪婪。
en: Be fearful when others are greedy and greedy when others are fearful.

zh: 投资自己是你能做的最好的投资。
en: The best investment you can make is in yourself.

zh: 永远不要浪费一场危机。
en: Never let a good crisis go to waste.
